channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: DuChamp + Felix-Florian Tödtloff + Sunk Heaven
item.description: ITR & Прачт… …are proud to bring an evening full noises, drones and ambiences. DuChamp [brln] Federica Rossella of SuperCheri and Pieuvre and also running Berlin’s Kitchen Leg Records is on tour with her solo project DuChamp, once more draping us in sonic surroundings of accordion drones, guitar rackets and according pedal feedback loops. website bc Felix-Florian Tödtloff [brln] …and another smooth noisician from Berlin: Felix-Florian Tödtloff of Swoosh is in town again, with scratching, billowing sound walls and some sweeter synth arpeggiations, too.

item.title: Giulio Erasmus & Ex-Worm 3000 + VMO aka. Violent Magic Orchestra
item.description: ITR & Hitness Club present: Giulio Erasmus [brussels / manchester] Giulio Erasmus: Re​-​Adjustment (album, 2021) VMO aka. Violent Magic Orchestra [japan] live vid DEATH RAVE (album, 2024) more info soon

item.title: Roger and the Pacemaker + Tavare + Nina Garcia + The New Solarism
item.description: Sat 19.4. H̳o̳l̳e̳m̳a̳n̳d̳a̳n̳c̳i̳k̳ Roger and the Pacemaker = Seijiro Murayama + Roger Fähndrich link The New Solarism video website ig sptf Tavare = Aidan Baker + Tristen Bakker + Angela Muñoz bc Nina Garcia Bye Bye Bird (album on Ideologic Organ, 2025) Doors 19:30 \ Start 20:15

item.title: Schade + Rouge Gorge + Weird Ugly Fish + Sheik Anorak
item.description: Claws of Saurtopia & Income Tax Refund present Schade [new wave disco psych] Rouge Gorge [odd synth pop] Weird Ugly Fish [drums’n’synths] Sheik Anorak [noisy exp. improv]
